item.title: Detect Stalkers over WiFi using WarDriving & the CreepDetector
item.description: Introduction # My friend and fellow hacker Kody Kinzie came up with the idea for the CreepDetector when we wanted to demonstrate how the average person might find WiFi reconnaissance useful. Using a technique called WarDriving, we wanted to create a proof-of-concept that allows someone to detect potential stalkers - by seeing if a creepy WiFi-enabled device (like a smartphone), is spotted at multiple unique GPS coordinates trailing them. What is WarDriving?
